rules_text:
[i]Extending AAAAAARM![/i] – {1}: Until end of turn, Nitori Kawashiro gains reach and “Whenever Nitori blocks, put a stun counter on each creature it's blocking.” Activate this ability only once each turn.
[i]Hydraulic Power[/i] – {U}: The next ability of an artifact you activate this turn costs {3} less to activate.
